Languages: Undercommon, understands Common but cannot speak

Traits.Name: Ethereal Presence
Traits.Content: The Howling Tunnel Denizen can move through solid objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Traits.Name: Cacophonous Howl
Traits.Content: Whenever a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the Howling Tunnel Denizen, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the start of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Howling Tunnel Denizen makes two attacks with Spectral Grasp.

Actions.Name: Spectral Grasp
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d12 + 6) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn, as the Denizen drains its energy.

Actions.Name: Echoing Wail (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Denizen unleashes a mournful howl. All creatures within a 15 ft. radius must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) psychic damage on a failed save and becoming deafened until the end of their next turn, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Actions.Name: Haunting Visage
Actions.Content: The Denizen manifests chilling images from its tragic past. Each creature of the Denizen's choice within 30 ft. must make a DC 16 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creatures take 40 (8d8 + 1) psychic damage and are frightened until the end of their next turn; on a successful save, they take half damage and are not frightened.
